title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 19 cm [7.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 20 cm [8"]  Selvedge one side, cut other side.
b. Warp: 21 cm [8 1/4"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 10 cm [4"]  Cut both sides.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. pink ground with bright pink and green
b. pink ground with bright pink and gold
